title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, June 17, 2021
description: “99 percent of every beautiful thing you ever knew escaped and went back out into the world where you vaguely remembered it.”― Ron Padgett, born this day in 1942.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “99 percent of every beautiful thing you ever knew escaped and went back out into the world where you vaguely remembered it.”― Ron Padgett, born this day in 1942.
